title: Historical place
text:
is the best-known example of an ancient Greek agora, located to the northwest of the Acropolis and bounded on the south by the hill of the Areopagus and on the west by the hill known as the Agoraios Kolonos, also called Market Hill.[1] The Agora's initial use was for a commercial, assembly, or residential gathering place.
The agora is spacious and temples, museum, the remains if prison, bath .... etc

title: Historical place
text: is an ancient citadel located on a rocky outcrop above the city of Athens and contains the remains of several ancient buildings of great architectural and historic significance, the most famous being the Parthenon.

title: Great
text: The hotel location is near to Syntagma square and very near to Athens Attractions (Acropolis, ancient agora ..,, etc) the room was spacious with room service twice daily. On the first night of stay the gifted a bottle of olive oil, tea box and large bottle of water. The rooms were very clean and neat. Breakfast offered daily on 10th floor with nice view of Athens and Acropolis. The staff were helpful, welcoming, polite and very respectful.

title: Good
text:
One night stay arranged by a friend. The hotel is located in the back of blue mosque and Sultanahmet. Little hard to find if you don't know the place.
The room is not big but calm and comfortable with big balcony. Staff very nice and helpful.
Breakfast was poor of variety.

title: Great stay
text:
The hotel is located at the Main Street with see view and metro access. The rooms are spacious with small disk and comfortable king size bed. Bathroom equipped with shower and Jacuzzi. The food was good with good variety.
The only thing I didn't like that shower has no real borders which will cause flooding to whole floor and needs special attention to dry it.

title: Marvelous
text:
The waterfall is located within a Park. It is a nice small forest with children play ground and even a couple was getting married there.
The waterfall is nit huge but very nice and still you can reach to behind and under the waterfall. A small rock is located under the waterfall where some people were going and having marvelous pictures with the waterfall. You can see fishes are growing there and enjoy the mix of water, forest and fishes.

title: Magnificent
text: Duden waterfalls is very beautiful and breathtaking place. You can see the place from top and you can go to be in the level of water under waterfall with special passages and caves behind the waterfall to see it from different places.

title: Satisfying stay
text:
I tried to contact the hotel after I reserved by email to check how reach the hotel with no response up-to date. I called their provided number and they disconnected the call with no proper answer. Upon check in they offered the regular room which was reserved but had to change it as all lights were down. They changed the room and offered to upgrade to suite for 35 € / night to have jacuzzi and big balcony. The regular room was ok but the bathroom needs renovation as it was all scratched sink is emptying very slow and they removed the bath-top clog that retains the water in.
The food was really interesting and delicious with great varieties and all buffets for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The only thing not liked that they are very strict to timing. If you miss by minute you lose. Even if you are in the restaurant they will remove food.
The spa looked ok with great facilities but no one to explain where to change and what allowed or what privileges do you have.
The outdoor pool was closed and for maintenance and underpass to see was closed too.

title: Magnificent
text:
The hotel was great, metro station is not faraway. Near to many attractions. The rooms were great, all in the minipar was free. They arranged for mobile modems so we had internet connection even out off the hotel which was very nice gesture of them.
The staff were very polite & helpful

title: Thermal treatment
text:
The place is supposed to be hotel and spa with sulpher thermal water. Upon visiting the spa as I'm not hotel guest they should the hot indoor swimming pool where the customers were complaining that water is not hot. They proposed private hot bath as water will be fresh and hot and they filled the it with water. Though it is private still the water is warm not hot and the room itself is cold (I'd recommend heating the place itself).
The massage was good and professional.
The place surrounding was great as in all Trabzon.

title: Wonderful hotel
text:
This hotel is really magnificent. Upon arrival they surprised me with upgrading my room from regular with city view to see view suite. It has spacious bedroom with closet and iron and Flat Screen. Setting room with big sofa and disk with anyflat screen and minipar. They were giving 2 bottles of water daily for hydration. The staff were really helpful and tactful. Breakfast variety was great.
Can't wait to be there again with my family.

title: Wounderful stay
text: The staff were really welcoming, Friendly & Helpful. I asked for early check-in & once I Arrived around 10:30 am my room was ready to accommodate me. my room was with River view so it was really magnificent even to stay in the room & look outside. It is very near to the Metro station which facilitate my movement around Prague. The breakfast was excellent & staff with beautiful smile. The awkward thing that they charged 150 Koruna to empty the minibar. Overall I’d recommend this hotel for pleasure & business.

title: Food is not that diverse
text: The breakfast menu was not that good as I stayed there 4 nights but the menu kept changing to worst. Lunch & dinner was not that wonderful.

title: Huge Castle
text: The castle was huge with a lot of diversities to see. I couldn't see it all as I had limitted time & was bound to Hup in - Hup Off tour

title: Beautiful Architecture
text: Very Beautiful Architecture on the river connecting the city to the mountains with Trees & wonderful River View

title: Pleasant Stay
text: The hotel is located directly with a metro exit. it is in the old city of Prague & attactions not far away. unfortunately the rooms with no great scenes. I got to my room & it was inner room with ver bad scene (some kind of metal ugly shapes were covering the window & I asked to change the room with street view. The room it self is nice & quite. the breakfast which is included was not that great. Unfortunately the food quality at Lunch & dinner was not better & menu was getting worst daily.

title: Nice Hotel
text:
The Reception staff were very helpful & professional with smile on faces. Rooms were clean nice arrangement & house keeping passing 2 times / day. meeting rooms were very will organized & the hotel is located near center very near to Danube River & touristic area. Internet speed was good.
The only thing I didn't like is the food quality as it was very bad & almost tasteless. the only thing that could be enjoyed in the 3 meals was the Salad & Fruit Salad.

title: Tasty Food
text: we went as a group to the restaurant, they arranged place to set together & tried to fix TV channel as per our request. Appetizers were very delicious. the food itself was great with great taste. I'd invite every one to try this restaurant as the price also was not that expensive

title: Good Hotel
text: The Hotel location is very near to the main attraction of Istanbul (Sultan Ahmad Mashid, Aya Sofia , Grand Bazar). it is really hard to reach the hotel on first time but I contacted the owner Mr. Ali who arranged Airport pickup for nice price. I asked the room to be rearranged to accommodate two persons on arrival & they were nice enough to arrange it with a smile on face. the only thing I didn't like is the room space as it was very small. Reception were very nice. Breakfast food was very delicious & would appreciate the Chef for her nice food arrangements. very near to it Big Bus for city tour & Sea tour. Mahmoud Basha was near to purchase all what you need of gifts to your family. As I had late flight so the owner was very kind & delayed my check out.

title: Business Trip
text:
it is relatively small hotel which has only two views either to the Parking or back side to Garden view.
For my Room the Heating system was OK. but the hot water in the Shower is not that good. if you try to increase the water flow it will immediately drop to freezing. for my colleagues some suffered from cold Room & Shower & others suffered cold Room but nice shower.
The break fast was not that diverse & they are not labeling the food to let you know what you have as for me I'm not eating Pork.
It is far from Services & the mini Par in reception is poor with supplies with very high prices compared to Supermarkets.

title: Nice Experience
text: They have a nice welcoming staff. the food quality & cleanness was good. the restaurant is fully occupied most of the time. food is in small portions but nice taste.

title: Great Experience
text: They were very welcoming. the staff is nice & welcoming. they have changed the food from menu against my request to remove the alcohol sauce from the food. the food was delicious & with nice deserts.

title: Business Trip
text: The hotel is located in main Street of King Fahd. easy to reach hotel with a small parking area provided . no break fast is provided. the room is considered very big with small kitchen facility. big Bathroom but on 2nd time being there the bathroom was leaking from shower & the washing Tap was not working. I asked for maintenance to fix & they promised to send but for 4 days stayed there & never got fixed.

title: Best Quality Fast Food
text: Al Baik is having branches all over Jeddah which makes is it easy to reach. the food quality is the best with very competitive price. the staff is friendly & helpful especially if you are eating within the restaurant. the only down side is that you have to wait a lot to receive your Order as the usually they ar having too much customers to service

title: Ok overall
text: The Hotel is near to Metro Station & Red Busses Hup in / off stations. The staff were nice & Helpful. Room is bet small with bed not the comfortable & no space to perform prayers. the breakfast was not much as mostly contains Pork. but still they offered some Bakery which is good to compensate. I found it little expensive & internet signal in my room was very poor (Room 906)

title: Very nice Stay
text: The Hotel is down Town, near to the main squares, near to Rosseo Metro Station. Wi-Fi signal was very good, Hotel staff were very nice and helpful. the room was luxurious with good space. It was little noisy as the Tram line is in contact with the hotel. Breakfast was very rich with varieties (Food, Bakery & Fruits)

title: Nice Place to enjoy away from People
text:
The Hotel is very Big with nice Rooms. it is surrounded by green land where ever you look. the staff were really Helpful especially with following with airport for my lost luggage & they provided me with small Box containing some items to help till I have received my bag back. the rooms are very Clean & nice with no noise. Wi-Fi was good.
The problem was it is so isolated & you should use a Taxi to go down town ; you can't walk to down town as there is no side walk for more than 0.5 km.
the Breakfast was Ok. but lunch was very bad with no varieties of food to choose from.

title: Couldn't Qualify to standards of Novotel in other places visited
text:
When we arrived to the Hotel there were only single lady a the reception and it was a busy day for guests who had reservation (the hotel could have asked some of her colleagues to help). she was all in one (reception, room service, telephone lady,...etc). the room was pet small with very small microbar (very small minibar). usually hotels offer at least one free complementary water bottle, in that particular place they put a water bottle with a small litters 5 Euro.
The room was clean with nice furniture. Breakfast buffet was bad ( no labels near the dishes) and all the meat was of Pork. so it was very limited buffet. the hotel is bet far for the Train station and the other hotels. Restaurants are located near to the station and going into city center which is 15-20 minutes far.
even though the weather was marvelous with nice wend out side but the air conditioner was not given cold air leaving you the choice to open window with noise and sun reflects on your laptop and TV or closed window with warm room
internet quality was poor (downloading e-mail was horrible and voice chatting was impossible)

title: Expensive Hotel
text:
The hotel is not far away from Central Station, Grand Palace & City Center. WIFI is great. Staff very Friendly & helpful.
The room is small with no minibar nor closet or safe box. it was noisy at night. they have a strict policy for no late check our. they are fixed

title: Very Beautiful Hotel
text: It was very nice stay. Hotel staff & location is very nice. not far from the airport & still very near to the Metro where you can reach any place in Dubai. Rooms were Clean with Nice view to Sheikh Zayed Road. Medium Swimming Pool.

title: Noisy, uncomfortable
text:
The hotel is located near the Tram station. They said it is canal view but they gave me a room in anither building that is street view where the tram noise is all day and night. Two Pars under the hotel which made the noise, screems and laughters in the room all the night.
Stairs are steep and small making it hard to climp up and more to get down especially if you have lagage.
Breakfast wasn't worth it.
I stayed their 2 nights on 20 & 21 Feb 2014. Overall not satisfied with the stay

title: It was Ok!
text:
The trip was on 17 - 20 Feb 2014. We felt like it is a remote area with no kind of intertaiment. Food menue realy was very bad especially for lunch and dinar.
wifi was very bad in all rooms that was not see side. It was better surrounding the hotel than in those rooms, They sent technician after many trials he brought special router for my room.

title: Good Experience, Thanks Mathieu
text:
The Hotel is located very near to the Metro station which made it very easy to move all over Paris Attraction. Single Room is small but comfortable, bath room is small & shower door is very narrow ( my suggestion to change the door type to the shower. Hotel room is neat & clean.
Receptionist was very nice, his name is Mathieu. he is really helpful. he helped me planning visit all over Paris showing the attractions & how to reach there.
the hotel restaurant need to have more food varieties to match every ones needs. but near restaurant & bakeries are available.

title: Unsatisfied
text:
The rooms are rectangular, the light is very dim - itwould be very bad if you try to study or read inside the room. Room service is good but I found used soup from previous tenant in the shower.
My colleague shower was leaking to the pathroom floor. and sounds can be heared from the other room.
The hotel has three resturants; Swimming pool، Italian ( I dont recommend both to any one) & finally the french resturant which far too expensivebut the same menue for lunch and dinner and same boufet for breakfast.
It is very far from down town and tourestic area. It toke more than an hour to reach pyramids.

title: Nice Review
text:
1- Very Nice Preview
2- Staff Hospitality
3- Twice Daily Romm Servicing with nice Cleaning
4- Land Lines & addition of fishes pools view is very nice & attractive
5- Adult & Children Swimming Pool
6- Big Room with a very nice Balcony
7- I Hated tha fact it was far away from City Center & the Market
